Literature.Title: Bioactivity of topologically confined gramicidin A dimers.
Literature.Author: Jadhav KB, Stein C, Makarewicz O, Pradel G, Lichtenecker RJ, Sack H, Heinemann SH, Arndt HD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(IC50=0.00015 ± 0.00001µM),Plasmodium falciparum Dd2(IC50=0.000029 ± 0.00001µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>64µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 7002(MIC=>64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>64µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=0.05µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=1µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium(MIC=2µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis PP62A(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>64µg/ml)
